titleStmt.title: Our Ladie hath a new sonne
titleStmt.author: C. N., fl. 1595.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the English secret press] Cum preuilegio,

notesStmt.note: The imprint is false; in fact printed in England by the secret press (STC).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
